title: Large Bedroom | Location & Walkable | 398 West Portal Ave #304
posting_body: ['THIRD FLOOR UNIT', 'Video Tour: https://youtu.be/N0iZQmuLPio', 'Managed By Chandler Properties Since 2007', 'Building With Lots Of Charm ||', 'Hardwood Floors', 'DETAILS', 'Rent: $3000', 'Address: 398 West Portal Ave San Francisco, CA 94127', 'Bed: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Lease Term: 12 months', 'Security Deposit: $3200', 'Application Fee: $45 Per Person', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Building professionally managed by Chandler Properties', '•Located on the 3rd floor', '•Spacious bedroom and living area', '•Desirable location is near retail and culinary delights', '•Large formal entry hall with a spacious coat closet and an additional linen closet', '•Close to the 280 Freeway and right on the Muni Train line which allows you to be downtown in literally fifteen minutes', '•Provision for landline and internet connection', '•No pets (except service animals as required by law)', 'Owner pays:', 'Water, Garbage & Steam Heating system', 'Tenant pays: PG&E and Internet Service', 'BUILDING:', 'Classic San Francisco Architecture', 'Common Area Shared Laundry Facilities', 'Street Parking', 'Elevator', 'Trash Chute per floor and Recycle and Compost on the Garage Level', 'NEIGHBORHOOD:', 'Found in the middle of everything, accessible to Market Street, Castro District, Twin Peaks, Sunset, Daily City, Ingleside', 'Located within walking distance to stores, great restaurants, Stonestown Mall, and Whole Foods Market', 'Easy access to the 280', 'Right on West Portal near Restaurants, Beauty Salons, Nail Salons, Banks, and Hardware Store', 'CONTACT:', 'Ready for a tour?', 'To view this unit please text/call or email above', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
